resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Generic - From Azure Database for PostgreSQL to ADL2 - parquet')]

activities.name: Get records to load into ADL2

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    MTC.*,
    BS.ScheduleName
FROM
    [operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchSchedule] BS ON MTC.BatchScheduleID = BS.BatchScheduleID
WHERE
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND MTC.Active = 1
    AND BS.Active = 1
    AND BS.ScheduleName = '@{pipeline().parameters.ScheduleName}'

activities.name: Load records into ADL2

dependsOn.activity: Get records to load into ADL2

activities.name: if - Verify tables to load into Destination

dependsOn.activity: Verify tables to load into Destination

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    2 AS InsertUpsert,
    NULL AS BatchProcessID,
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    PR.ProjectID,
    MTC.BatchScheduleID,
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID,
    BPTD.ProcessTableName,
    BPTD.TableGroupNumber,
    MTC.GroupLoad
FROM
	[operation].[ProjectName] PR
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[BatchSchedule] BS ON PR.ProjectID = BS.ProjectID
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BS.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD ON MTC.TableGroupNumber = BPTD.TableGroupNumber
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID
CROSS JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessStatusName] BPSM
WHERE
    --Please check passed filters:
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID = 10 --Status = 'Process running'
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND BPTD.ProcessTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'

SELECT
    2 AS InsertUpsert,
    NULL AS BatchProcessID,
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    PR.ProjectID,
    MTC.BatchScheduleID,
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID,
    BPTD.ProcessTableName,
    BPTD.TableGroupNumber,
    MTC.GroupLoad
FROM
	[operation].[ProjectName] PR
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[BatchSchedule] BS ON PR.ProjectID = BS.ProjectID
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BS.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD ON MTC.TableGroupNumber = BPTD.TableGroupNumber
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID
CROSS JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessStatusName] BPSM
WHERE
    --Please check passed filters:
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID = 100 --"End with success"
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND BPTD.ProcessTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'

SELECT
    2 AS InsertUpsert,
    NULL AS BatchProcessID,
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    PR.ProjectID,
    MTC.BatchScheduleID,

    BPTD.ProcessTableName,

activities.name: Verify tables to load into Destination

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT
    'Yes'                       AS ProcessTable,
    BPTD.BatchProcessID         AS BatchProcessID
FROM
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BPTD.TableGroupNumber = MTC.TableGroupNumber
    AND BPTD.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
WHERE
    BPTD.ActiveInBatchProcess = 1
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND MTC.FinalTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT
    'No'                        AS ProcessTable,
    BPTD.BatchProcessID         AS BatchProcessID
FROM
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BPTD.TableGroupNumber = MTC.TableGroupNumber
    AND BPTD.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
WHERE
    BPTD.ActiveInBatchProcess = 0
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND MTC.FinalTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    MTC.*,
    BS.ScheduleName
FROM
    [operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchSchedule] BS ON MTC.BatchScheduleID = BS.BatchScheduleID
WHERE
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND MTC.Active = 1
    AND BS.Active = 1
    AND BS.ScheduleName = '@{pipeline().parameters.ScheduleName}'

activities.name: Load records into ADL2

dependsOn.activity: Get records to load into ADL2

activities.name: if - Verify tables to load into Destination

dependsOn.activity: Verify tables to load into Destination

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    2 AS InsertUpsert,
    NULL AS BatchProcessID,
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    PR.ProjectID,
    MTC.BatchScheduleID,
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID,
    BPTD.ProcessTableName,
    BPTD.TableGroupNumber,
    MTC.GroupLoad
FROM
	[operation].[ProjectName] PR
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[BatchSchedule] BS ON PR.ProjectID = BS.ProjectID
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BS.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD ON MTC.TableGroupNumber = BPTD.TableGroupNumber
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID
CROSS JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessStatusName] BPSM
WHERE
    --Please check passed filters:
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID = 10 --Status = 'Process running'
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND BPTD.ProcessTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'

SELECT
    2 AS InsertUpsert,
    NULL AS BatchProcessID,
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    PR.ProjectID,
    MTC.BatchScheduleID,
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID,
    BPTD.ProcessTableName,
    BPTD.TableGroupNumber,
    MTC.GroupLoad
FROM
	[operation].[ProjectName] PR
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[BatchSchedule] BS ON PR.ProjectID = BS.ProjectID
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BS.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD ON MTC.TableGroupNumber = BPTD.TableGroupNumber
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID
CROSS JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessStatusName] BPSM
WHERE
    --Please check passed filters:
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID = 100 --"End with success"
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND BPTD.ProcessTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'

SELECT
    2 AS InsertUpsert,
    NULL AS BatchProcessID,
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    PR.ProjectID,
    MTC.BatchScheduleID,
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID,
    BPTD.ProcessTableName,
    BPTD.TableGroupNumber,
    MTC.GroupLoad
FROM
	[operation].[ProjectName] PR
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[BatchSchedule] BS ON PR.ProjectID = BS.ProjectID
INNER JOIN
	[operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BS.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD ON MTC.TableGroupNumber = BPTD.TableGroupNumber
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID
CROSS JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessStatusName] BPSM
WHERE
    --Please check passed filters:
    BPSM.BatchProcessStatusNameID = 20 --"End with error"
    AND MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND BPTD.ProcessTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'

activities.name: Verify tables to load into Destination

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT
    'Yes'                       AS ProcessTable,
    BPTD.BatchProcessID         AS BatchProcessID
FROM
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BPTD.TableGroupNumber = MTC.TableGroupNumber
    AND BPTD.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
WHERE
    BPTD.ActiveInBatchProcess = 1
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND MTC.FinalTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT
    'No'                        AS ProcessTable,
    BPTD.BatchProcessID         AS BatchProcessID
FROM
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD
INNER JOIN
    [operation].[MetadataTableControl] MTC ON BPTD.TableGroupNumber = MTC.TableGroupNumber
    AND BPTD.BatchScheduleID = MTC.BatchScheduleID
WHERE
    BPTD.ActiveInBatchProcess = 0
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessPhaseNameID}'
    AND BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessID}'
    AND MTC.GroupLoad = '@{pipeline().parameters.GroupLoad}'
    AND MTC.FinalTableName = '@{item().FinalTableName}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    3 AS InsertUpsert,
    MAX(BPTD.BatchProcessPhaseNameID) AS BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    100 AS BatchProcessStatusNameID,
    BPTD.BatchProcessID
FROM
    [operation].[BatchProcessTableDetails] BPTD
WHERE
    BPTD.BatchProcessID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchProcessIDOutPut}'
GROUP BY
    BPTD.BatchProcessID

SELECT DISTINCT
    1 AS InsertUpsert,
    NULL AS BatchProcessID,
    MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID,
    PR.ProjectID,
    MTC.BatchScheduleID,
    0 AS BatchProcessStatusNameID,
    NULL AS TableGroupNumber,

FROM
    [operation].[ProjectName] PR
INNER JOIN

INNER JOIN
    [operation].[BatchProcessPhaseName] BPPN ON MTC.BatchProcessPhaseNameID = BPPN.BatchProcessPhaseNameID
WHERE
